        Parameters:
        symbology - Symbology to query
        Returns:

      • setScanDirection

        void setScanDirection(BarcodeReader.ScanDirection direction)
        Set a hint for the underlying SDK to only scan for barcodes in one direction
        Parameters:
        direction - which direction to scan

      • setFindMultipleBarcodes

        void setFindMultipleBarcodes(boolean enabled)
        Enable detecting multiple barcodes in a single image
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable, false to disable

      • setRelativeScanRect

        void setRelativeScanRect(Rect r)
        Crop input image and scan only cropped region. This can speed up the scanning process.
        Parameters:
        r - Rectangle to crop to
